profile.name: Nabilah Argyanti
profile.bio: As a graduate of Informatics Engineering, I have a keen interest in web development and data science. With one year of industry experience, I am skilled in developing web applications. Currently, I am exploring innovative solutions using web technologies and studying the application of data science to solve problems. My skills include proficiency in Laravel and exploration of technologies such as Vue.js, Inertia, Tailwind, and data processing with Python.

education.thesis: Thesis: Recipes Recommendation System Based on Ingredients Availability and User Preferences

technical_skills.description: I'm experienced in web development, crafting dynamic applications, managing CRUD operations proficiently, and addressing diverse web-based requirements adeptly.
I'm capable of analyzing data using various algorithms and techniques in data science to derive valuable insights and predictive solutions.

work_experience.title: Programmer at UPA TIK Politeknik Negeri Malang
jobdesk: Developing the official website and the Public Information Disclosure Portal (PPID) for Politeknik Negeri Malang using WordPress and Elementor
Designing and developing an E-office website for digital correspondence within Politeknik Negeri Malang using Laravel

work_experience.title: Backend Developer at PT Adma Digital Solusi
jobdesk: Managing recipe data and ingredients to recommend recipes using Python
Developing a recipe recommendation application based on ingredient availability using Django

work_experience.title: Web Developer at Awesome Language Stability
jobdesk: Designing and developing a TOEFL prediction website using the CodeIgniter framework
Collaborating with the project team to integrate necessary services in the development of the TOEFL prediction website, ensuring its accuracy and reliability
